post.body: Hello ZeroMe! Can't delete this, click the confirmation button, no responses.
Eventually here will be another pirate bay?
How do I delete my posts or edit them? Ahaha I figured it out.
not working well on remote server and access by ipad. can't upload profile picture, sometimes can't post messages on billboard. can't delete twittes.
does anyone have used bleep before? it's a good concept by using by network to deliver messages, it's a decentralized messager, but stop activities almost 1 year ago, pity.

every house should hold their own family server, hosts this kind of decentralized services, this will decrease internet traffic on backbone infrastructure after most of people get synchronized, due to most of the traffics are contributed by video streams.

comment.body: Due to DDOS attack on DNS servers?
You shouldn't put your private photos into an untrusting online drives at first time.
不需要移动客户端的，pc上zeronet.py --ui_ip 0.0.0.0 通过手机浏览器就可以打开了
